testcase.name: test_adjust_normal_points
testcase.failure: backend/tests/test_shop_two_tier_points.py:282: in test_adjust_normal_points assert response.status_code == 200, f"Expected 200, got {response.status_code}: {response.text}" E AssertionError: Expected 200, got 422: {"detail":[{"type":"string_type","loc":["body","user_id"],"msg":"Input should be a valid string","input":null,"url":"https://errors.pydantic.dev/2.12/v/string_type"}]} E assert 422 == 200 E + where 422 = <Response [422]>.status_code
